title: Minimal Reliance on Foreign Aid
description: In 2022, Malaysia's net Official Development Assistance (ODA) received was only 0.0067% of its central government expenses, indicating a low dependency on foreign aid.

title: Significant Forest Depletion
description: In 2021, Malaysia experienced a net forest depletion valued at approximately $6.36 billion, highlighting environmental challenges related to deforestation.

title: High Net Intake Rate for Male Students
description: In 2017, Malaysia achieved a 100% net intake rate for male students entering grade 1, reflecting strong educational enrollment for young boys.

title: Minimal Battle-Related Deaths
description: In 2017, Malaysia reported only 1 battle-related death, indicating a peaceful domestic environment.

title: Limited Arms Exports
description: In 2019, Malaysia's arms exports were valued at $1,000,000, suggesting a modest role in the global arms trade.
